mapper.select: SELECT id, code, description FROM usertask;
SELECT id, code, description, us_type, forceable FROM usershift ORDER BY description;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usershift (code, description, us_type, forceable) VALUES (#{code},#{description},#{us_type},#{forceable});
mapper.update: UPDATE usertask SET id = #{id}, code = #{code}, description = #{description} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE usershift SET id = #{id}, code = #{code}, description = #{description}, us_type = #{us_type}, forceable = #{forceable} WHERE id = #{id};
